# Transaction Category Balance Test Data
# Fixed-width format for testing CBTRN03C migration
# Format: AccountID(12) BalanceDate(10) TransTypeCode(2) CategoryCode(4) BalanceAmount(15) Padding(7)
# Total record length: 50 characters per line to match VSAM TCATBAL structure

# Account 000000001001 - Multiple categories for aggregation testing
0000000010012024-01-15011001000000000025000       
0000000010012024-01-15021002000000000015000       
0000000010012024-01-15011003000000000050000       
0000000010012024-01-15031001-00000000001500       

# Account 000000001002 - Different transaction types

0000000010022024-01-16021002000000000075000       
0000000010022024-01-16041004000000000025000       
0000000010022024-01-16011003000000000200000

0000000010042024-03-10031003000000000050000
